0.6.4.en: Hide options for non HP23 users

0.7.0.en: Refactored UI, add support for multiple Homeys, and support multiple insights in same graph.

0.8.0.en: Use 24h format for Charts, add view for all implemented capabilities, emphasize device/capability/insight/flow picker buttons, round insight values to log decimals.

0.8.1.en: Fixed thermostat mode issue, capability last updated, and insight null values.

0.9.0.en: Refactored editing UI to fix scrolling on mobile devices.

0.9.1.en: Fix dragging widgets on mobile devices
